discourse_list.title: Snapshot.page: New venue for collecting proposal feedback

content.content: snapshot.page has been bootstrapped and now you can create proposals on snapshot.page/#/uniswap to understand community support for your proposals, before furthering your proposal e.g. via autonomous proposals or advocating for delegation. Please give it a try to understand support for your proposals. Some tips:  You must delegate for votes to count on a proposal You can set the proposal snapshot block number to around the end date of the proposal (or any future block number) so people can delegate after the proposal is created and voting has started  Currently there is no UNI requirement for a proposal to show up on the snapshot page. This is open source and you are able to send pull requests to the repository.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining a new platform called snapshot.page that allows users to create proposals and gauge community support before advocating for delegation. The post also provides tips for using the platform. The post may be of interest to those looking to create proposals and receive feedback.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Have an error at sign process. How do I do this correctly? image750×1334 56 KB

What kind of wallet are you using? AFAIK snapshot it does not support EIP-1271 for smart contract signatures, in case you are using a smart contract wallet. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1271.md
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match

content.content: Coinbase wallet where I have UNI token. Should I move tokens to Metamask and connect?
To add onto that, everyone please make sure to provide detailed proposals. Thanks for setting this up! Definitely a great place to hopefully collect community sentiment on proposals and ideas.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Awesome, so the snapshot page is a place to signal support for votes?  Not binding but strong as a signal of token weights?
